title: One Piece Episode #531 Anime Review
author: Fandompost Editorial
description: A review of Episode 531 discussing how the episode focuses on world-building and exploring the underwater kingdom rather than hitting major plot points, which is described as 'classic One Piece'. The review appreciates the value in showcasing the world's unique details.

title: The Mermaid Princess is a Cry Baby || One Piece Episode 529, 530 & 531 REACTION
author: RuffSenpai
description: A reaction video covering episodes 529, 530, and 531, focusing on the introduction of Princess Shirahoshi and her tearful personality.

title: One Piece Episode 531 Reaction | Yes Officer! That Is Him Right There!
author: JennAnime Reactions
description: A reaction video specifically covering Episode 531, featuring humorous reactions to Luffy's encounter with Princess Shirahoshi.

title: Episode 531, 'Human Jimbei'
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast's 531st episode featuring a manga recap of Chapter 913. Note: This podcast episode number coincidentally matches anime episode 531 but covers different content (Wano arc manga chapters).

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Wano arc manga content

title: Episode 531 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 531 containing plot summary, character debuts, production information, trivia, and manga chapter correspondence.
